acts.act: Protection of Children from Sexual Offence Act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused Juwakin Tirki is produced from jail hazot. Today is the date fixed for delivery of judgment. Judgment is written on separate sheets and delivered in open court and enclosed with case record. For the reasons recorded in the judgment, I have arrived at the finding that prosecution has succeeded to bring home the charge u/s 4 of the POCSO Act, 2012 against accused Juwakin Tirki and accordingly he is convicted under the section. The accused person is heard on the matter of sentence and same is recorded in a separate sheet in the form of question and answer and kept with the case record. Accordingly, accused Juwakin Tirki is sentenced for his offence u/s 4 of the POCSO of Act. He is sentenced to undergo R.I. for 7 (seven) years and also to pay fine of Rs, 10,000/- in default R.I. for another 6 (six) months under Section 4 of the POCSO Act. Periodof detention already undergone be set off as per provision of Section 428 Cr.P.C. Seized material, if any shall be destroyed in due course of law. The accused person is already in custody. Issue imprisonment Warrant against the accused to serve the sentence passed against him. Free copy of judgment be furnished to the convict immediately. Copy of the judgment be sent to learned District Magistrate of Nagaon u/s 365 Cr. P.C. This Sessions case is accordingly disposed of.

Issue imprisonment Warrant against the accused to serve the sentence passed against him. Free copy of judgment be furnished to the convict immediately. Copy of the judgment be sent to learned District Magistrate of Nagaon u/s 365 Cr. P.C. This Sessions case is accordingly disposed of.
